snippet.title: Silent Scope - Trailer [PlayStation 2]
snippet.description:
Get ready to experience the arcade hit on PlayStation 2 computer entertainment system. The President and his family have been kidnapped by lethal terrorists, and the government turns to an elite counter-terrorist sniper to neutralize the hostile threats. Your mission is to infiltrate the terrorist's headquarters, clear all areas of danger and return the President's family safely to the White House. Players must carefully neutralize the terrorist targets without injuring hostages or innocent bystanders. Silent Scope features tons of missions that take place in widely varied environments, including downtown cities, freeways and sprawling estates. Gamers will have to carry out their objectives from various perspectives, including land, sea and air.

RELEASED: October 23rd 2002 (PS2 Launch Game)
PUBLISHER: Konami
DEVELOPER: KCET
